page.title: 12Chalton Village part one.
page.content: {Chalton}is a{Ribbon Settlement}in the county of Bedfordshire,with a population of approximately{550.}There are only a dozen of the original inhabitants still living in Chalton, the oldest being a 94 year old lady. There are two farms in Chalton,Dairy Church farm and Ward Manor farm.Ward Manor is an arable farm of 400 acres, growing wheat and barley.It is owned by Mr Aldred.Dairy Church farm is a dairy farm.Common farm is a riding stable.There is one shop and post office in the village.There is also a Public House called the Star,and a lower school called Chalton Lower School.There is a childrens playground swings and a slide.There are two bus routes serving Chalton,one going to Luton via Sundon Park Road,and another going from Luton back to Chalton via Toddington Road.
